clubNews.title: Annual General Meeting 2024
clubNews.summary: Successfully conducted the Annual General Meeting for 2024. Discussed yearly achievements, budget allocation, and upcoming events.
clubNews.content: The AGM was attended by 150+ members. Key decisions included budget allocation for new equipment, planning for ROBOCON 2024, and electing new office bearers.
clubNews.author: Club Secretary

clubNews.title: New 3D Printer Installation
clubNews.summary: Successfully installed two new industrial-grade 3D printers in our prototyping lab.
clubNews.content: The new Creality CR-10 and Prusa i3 MK3S+ printers will significantly enhance our rapid prototyping capabilities. Training sessions will be conducted next week.
clubNews.author: Lab Manager

clubNews.title: Winter Workshop Series Completion
clubNews.summary: Successfully completed the 4-week winter workshop series on ROS2 and Autonomous Navigation.
clubNews.content: Over 80 students participated in the workshop series. Final projects included autonomous line followers and SLAM implementations.
clubNews.author: Workshop Coordinator

clubNews.title: Call for ROBOCON 2024 Team Members
clubNews.summary: Applications open for ROBOCON 2024 team members. Deadline: January 20, 2024.
clubNews.content: We're looking for passionate members for mechanical design, electronics, programming, and AI/ML roles. Interviews will be conducted in the last week of January.
clubNews.author: Competition Head

clubNews.title: Weekly Coding Session Resumes
clubNews.summary: Weekly coding sessions resume from January 8, 2024. Focus on algorithms for robotics.
clubNews.content: Sessions every Monday 5-7 PM in Lab 3. Topics include path planning algorithms, computer vision basics, and optimization techniques.
clubNews.author: Technical Head

clubNews.title: Alumni Interaction Session
clubNews.summary: Successful alumni interaction session with former club presidents.
clubNews.content: Alumni shared industry experiences, career guidance, and pledged support for club projects. Networking opportunities were created.
clubNews.author: Alumni Coordinator

industryNews.title: Boston Dynamics Unveils New Humanoid Robot
industryNews.summary: Boston Dynamics reveals Atlas 2.0 with enhanced mobility and AI capabilities.
industryNews.content: The new Atlas demonstrates unprecedented agility and can now handle complex manipulation tasks. Features improved power efficiency and learning algorithms.

industryNews.title: OpenAI Develops Robotics-Specific AI Model
industryNews.summary: OpenAI announces RoboGPT, a specialized model for robotics applications.
industryNews.content: RoboGPT shows significant improvements in robot task planning and natural language interaction. Expected to accelerate robotics research.

industryNews.title: Tesla Optimus Production Update
industryNews.summary: Tesla announces Optimus humanoid robot production timeline.
industryNews.content: Elon Musk reveals plans for limited production in 2024, with mass production targeted for 2025. Focus on manufacturing and domestic applications.

industryNews.title: Breakthrough in Soft Robotics
industryNews.summary: MIT researchers develop self-healing soft robotic actuators.
industryNews.content: New material allows soft robots to repair minor damage autonomously. Potential applications in medical devices and hazardous environments.

industryNews.title: Drone Delivery Expansion in Urban Areas
industryNews.summary: Major companies expand urban drone delivery networks.
industryNews.content: Amazon, Wing, and Zipline announce expanded operations in multiple cities. Regulatory approvals accelerating commercial adoption.

industryNews.title: New ROS2 Humble Release
industryNews.summary: ROS2 Humble Hawksbill long-term support release announced.
industryNews.content: Latest LTS release brings improved performance, security features, and better Windows support. Recommended for production systems.
